Created attachment 28509
first try on implementing auto-indentation

Hi!

I think it would be awesome if beanshell and maybe other textarea-inputs too (eg. PostBody HTTP Request sampler for json and xml) in  would have auto-indentation.

I attached a clumsy mockup of the idea which implements this for the BeanShellAssertion component when using curly braces. However, this is stricktly a mockup and not meant for any productive use ;)

br,
Imm

Hello,
Thanks for contribution.
If you want to have this feature included in JMeter you will have to provide a complete and tested implementation.
I on my side don't think it's high priority but will be happy to include it if you provide a complete patch for it.

Feel free to reopen issue with patch.
Thanks.
Regards
Philippe
